text: Orchard Island is an unincorporated community and tourist area located in Washington and Stokes townships, Logan County, Ohio, United States. Orchard Island is part of an island chain which includes the southeastern shore of Indian Lake, north of Russells Point. Orchard Island is the largest of the nearby islands. These include Wolfe, Fox, Willow Bank, and Crystal Beach."Map Showing Development Areas at Indian Lake" , Indian Lake. Retrieved 26 April 2011 == References == Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: Orchard Island, Ohio
